- - - Updated - - -

And I need specifics when adjusting like below x speed it drags too much at 10k or something. I will look bacl through the comments and adjust next pc time.

- - - Updated - - -

For those who want to try: look in .cfg text file with notepad, look for

min drag =

And

Max drag =

And for aero surfaces look for the entry like this:

MODULE

{

name = ModuleLiftingSurface

useInternalDragModel = False

deflectionLiftCoeff = 10.0

dragAtMaxAoA = 0.1

dragAtMinAoA = 0.001

}

Its self explanitary how its listed.

Cool, can't wait!

Its one of the easiest thing to install, this VTOL. Place it om the rear floor node and go.

There is allowances to add other fuels but it only spawns with half tank of lf and lo by default.

All stock friendly and with a bit of a ksp style.

Also has a attach node up front to replace the one in the cargobay it covers for payloads. Hence the frame structure.

Its all made up obviously but this is ksp so meh
